content: this boho-style crochet wallet is a stylish accessory for your crochet bag collection the stunning crescent flap and pocket can be easily executed with the help of pictures and a full-length video tutorial about the pattern this pattern is designed for an easy skill level the instruction portion of the pattern is 4 pages long the pattern includes close-up photos to demonstrate techniques and a full-length video tutorial here s an excerpt of the pattern writing style single_crochet in the 2nd chain from hook single_crochet 22 chain 1 turn 23 single_crochet finished size approximately 4 5 in 11 cm x 2 5 in 6 cm stitches used chain- chain half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet repeat - repeat skip - skip slip_stitch - slip_stitch supplies used hook us size c 3 mm hook yarn crafter s secret cotton yarn size 4 medium weight 100% cotton 120 yds/ 18m per 70-72g 1 roll in papaya or yellow *large sewing needle magnetic snap optional niagara starch spray
